entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:45 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -23.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 3:49 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -23.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: NNW 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
